name: Mushaf Win Application
short_description:
Mushaf Windows App. is a Quranic App. That Developed By Java Virtual Machine For Windows.
Similar Projects are:
   Musahf Linux App
   Mushaf Mac App
   Mushaf Android App
   Mushaf PHP App
   Mushaf ASP App
   Mushaf JSP App
that three last project is a cms that installed on your web hosting in root domain or subdomain and create a website such as : tanzil.org or quran.com

Mushaf Application is under the direct supervision of Mushaf.net and very reliable
each project have a management dashboard panel that you can add/remove Quranic calligraphy,Quran translation/transliteration, Quran interpretation,Interpretation's relationships in an interesting enviroment
in other word : you can management the content of your program and change it's source code if you are a developer
Mushaf.net supported all version of this apps and all content of quran such as :calligraphy,translation,transliteration,interpretation and etc.
